page.title: Computer Science
page.text: CS is all about fast [[Mathematics]]. And [[Mathematics]]. And also [[Mathematics]]!

page.title: Mathematics
page.text: Mathematics is such an awesome discipline. [[Philosophy]] [[Philosophy]] [[Philosophy]] too!

page.title: Philosophy
page.text: [[Mathematics]] and [[Ancient Greece]] are highly related. [[Ancient Greece]] is cool too.

page.title: Ancient Greece
page.text: Remarkable figures include Socrates, or Aristotle. They lives in [[Ancient Greece]]. They did some [[Mathematics]]. And [[Philosophy]]
